      • Ghost

        public Ghost(double x,
             double y,
             javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
             Maze maze,
             GameManager gameManager)
        Constructor
        参数:
        x - - x-axis of ghost
        y - - y-axis of ghost
        color - - Color for the ghost
        maze - - the maze of gameManager
        gameManager - - gameManager

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRandomDirection

        private java.lang.String getRandomDirection(java.lang.String exclude1,
                                            java.lang.String exclude2)
        Get random direction for the ghost to move.
        参数:
        exclude1 - - the direction should not go to
        exclude2 - - the direction should not go to
        返回:
        directions[rnd] - the direction generated randomly

      • getAnimation

        public javafx.animation.AnimationTimer getAnimation()
        Gets the animation for the ghost.
        返回:
        animation

      • checkIftheresPathToGo

        public void checkIftheresPathToGo(java.lang.String direction)
        Check the if the pacman can move to that direction.
        参数:
        direction - - new direction

      • moveUntilYouCantLeft

        public void moveUntilYouCantLeft(double leftEdge,
                                 double topEdge,
                                 double padding)
        Move until you cannot to left, try the 'down' direction. If go through the left door, set pacman's coordinate to the right door.
        参数:
        leftEdge - - leftEdge of ghost
        topEdge - - topEdge of ghost
        padding - - padding of ghost

      • moveUntilYouCantRight

        public void moveUntilYouCantRight(double rightEdge,
                                  double leftEdge,
                                  double topEdge,
                                  double padding)
        Move until you cannot to right, try the 'up' direction. If go through the right door, set pacman's coordinate to the left door.
        参数:
        leftEdge - - leftEdge of ghost
        topEdge - - topEdge of ghost
        rightEdge - - rightEdge of ghost
        padding - - padding of ghost

      • moveUntilYouCantUp

        public void moveUntilYouCantUp(double leftEdge,
                               double topEdge,
                               double padding)
        Move until you cannot to up, try the 'left' direction.
        参数:
        leftEdge - - leftEdge of ghost
        topEdge - - topEdge of ghost
        padding - - padding of ghost

      • moveUntilYouCantDown

        public void moveUntilYouCantDown(double leftEdge,
                                 double topEdge,
                                 double bottomEdge,
                                 double padding)
        Move until you cannot to down, try the 'right' direction.
        参数:
        leftEdge - - leftEdge of ghost
        topEdge - - topEdge of ghost
        bottomEdge - - bottomEdge of ghost
        padding - - padding of ghost

      • createAnimation

        public void createAnimation()
        Creates an animation of the ghost. If the ghost is inside the start box, lead them to get out. If there is no obstacle between ghost and pacman, ghost will randomly choose from two direction to approach pacman.

      • run

        public void run()
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
